meanings.sent1: I need to compute the total cost of my groceries.
meanings.sent2: She likes to compute the answer before checking her work.
meanings.sent3: Trying to compute how many cookies I can eat without getting a stomachache.
meanings.sent4: Her mind raced to compute the best route to take in the maze.
meanings.sent5: I always compute the distance to the nearest gas station before a road trip.

meanings.definition: To process data using a computer
meanings.sent1: The supercomputer can compute complex calculations in seconds.
meanings.sent2: They compute large amounts of data to generate accurate weather forecasts.
meanings.sent3: The robot paused to compute the most efficient way to complete the task.
meanings.sent4: The computer hummed softly as it worked to compute the algorithm.
meanings.sent5: I watch in amazement as the machine computes the intricate patterns.
